item.title: Communication Hacks I Learned From Job Interview Feedback
item.description: Photo credits to UnknownNet Photography I’ve been in search of a new job for the past few months. Thanks to my recruiters and interviewers, I’ve received some useful feedback. Many thanks to them for this gift. ``Needs more energy’’ - This was the most memorable feedback I got. It was from the VP of a company. My interview with him was the last of the five on the same day.
